headline: Looming Oil Price Weakness Clouds OFS Giants’ Outlook
summary: OFS giants SLB, Halliburton and Baker Hughes reported strong 2Q earnings but are wary of looming 4Q oil price weakness.

raw.headline: Looming Oil Price Weakness Clouds OFS Giants’ Outlook
raw.summary: OFS giants SLB, Halliburton and Baker Hughes reported strong 2Q earnings but are wary of looming 4Q oil price weakness.

headline: Baker Hughes buys Chart Industries for $13.6 billion in oilfield services deal, outbidding and canceling planned Chart-Flowserve merger
summary: The Baker Hughes acquisition represents the biggest oilfield services deal in years as the fragmented industry consolidates.

raw.headline: Baker Hughes buys Chart Industries for $13.6 billion in oilfield services deal, outbidding and canceling planned Chart-Flowserve merger
raw.summary: The Baker Hughes acquisition represents the biggest oilfield services deal in years as the fragmented industry consolidates.

headline: TechnipFMC Beats Q2 Estimates on Strong Performance of Subsea Segment
summary: FTI's second-quarter earnings and revenues beat estimates, driven by its Subsea unit's growth with strong project activity.

raw.headline: TechnipFMC Beats Q2 Estimates on Strong Performance of Subsea Segment
raw.summary: FTI's second-quarter earnings and revenues beat estimates, driven by its Subsea unit's growth with strong project activity.
